attributes.action: Allow the payment of bank staff bonuses once the banks have paid back to each household the average £40,000 that has been paid in taxpayers money to date.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Bank staff have threatened to walk out if they do not receive their 80% bonus. I think this payment is reasonable once the taxpayers money has been reimbursed. Considering many companies that fall into debt by the billion will go bankrupt, the taxpayer has paid £850bn to date in order to keep bank staff in a job and off the breadline. If each household received their £40,000 rebate from the banks, many people struggling to pay their mortgage would be assured they will not default on their payments and lose their home, thereby ensuring equality for the bank staff demanding their 80% bonus.
